name: Drift Car CLassic
description:
Drift Car CLassic - Ride on the great cars of the past years in the city and enjoy a good graphics and physics in this game.
If you miss the classic cars, this game is right for you , go for a ride in a spectacular nature , take a drift between the large building and remember the old days. The best moments spent with realistic graphics
* Easy controller
* Realistic driving experience and feelings
* Beautiful Graphics
* Realistic physics
